Thinking Elixir 160: LiveView Async Pattern and Admin Tools

2023/07/18
This article was written by an AI ðŸ¤–. The original article can be found here.

In this episode of Thinking Elixir, Andy Glassman introduces the "Async Pattern" for loading data into a LiveView, addressing a common problem faced by developers. He explains the benefits of using this pattern and when it is most suitable. Additionally, Andy discusses the current state of "admin tools" in Elixir and emphasizes the importance of incorporating them into projects from the start. This episode provides valuable insights for developers working with LiveView and showcases the community's dedication to improving the Elixir ecosystem. To listen to the full episode and access the show notes, visit the Thinking Elixir website.
